com.continuuity.loom.store
Interface ClusterStore

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseClusterStore, SQLClusterStore
public interface ClusterStore

Persistent store for clusters, jobs, tasks, and nodes.

Method Summary

          Delete the cluster that has the given id.

getCluster

Cluster getCluster(String clusterId)
                   throws Exception
Get a specific cluster by id.

Parameters:
clusterId - Id of the cluster to find.
Returns:
The cluster matching the id, or null if no cluster exists.

Exception - if there was a problem getting the cluster.

getCluster

Cluster getCluster(String clusterId,
                   String ownerId)
                   throws Exception
Get a specific cluster by id if it is owned by the given user id.

Parameters:
clusterId - Id of the cluster to find.
ownerId - Id of the user that owns the cluster.
Returns:
The cluster matching the cluster and user ids, or null if no cluster exists.
Throws:
Exception - if there was a problem getting the cluster.

getClusterJob

ClusterJob getClusterJob(JobId jobId)
                         throws TaskException
Get a cluster job by its id.

Parameters:
jobId - Id of the cluster job to get.
Returns:
The cluster job with the given id, or null if none exists.

getClusterJobs

Map<JobId,ClusterJob> getClusterJobs(Set<JobId> jobIds)
                                     throws TaskException
Get a map of jobid to cluster job for that job id.

Parameters:
jobIds - Set of jobs ids to get.
Returns:
Map of job id to cluster job. Job ids without a cluster job are not included.
Throws:
TaskException - if there was a problem getting the cluster jobs.

getClusterNodes

Set<Node> getClusterNodes(String clusterId)
                          throws Exception
Get all nodes belonging to a specific cluster.

Parameters:
clusterId - Id of the cluster whose nodes will be fetched.
Returns:
Set of all nodes belonging to specified cluster. Empty if no cluster or cluster nodes exist.
Throws:
Exception - if there was a problem getting the cluster nodes.

getNodes

Set<Node> getNodes(Set<String> nodeIds)
                   throws Exception
Get all nodes specified in the input set.

Parameters:
nodeIds - Set of ids of all nodes to fetch.
Returns:
Set of nodes matching the input node ids. Values may include nulls if the node did not exist.
Throws:
Exception - if there was a problem getting the nodes.

                                 throws Exception

Parameters:

Returns:
set of tasks.
Throws:
Exception
